constructor.details: setup function to initialize the Aqua Factory

params._feeManager: address that is allowed to update fees
params._feeNumerator: fee that is token on depositing tokens
params._saleFee: fixed amount of native currency (ETH) to be paid for launch a project
params._templateFee: fixed amount of native currency (ETH) to be paid for adding a template
params._templateManager: address that is allowed to manage templates

launchTemplate(uint256,bytes,string).details: function to launch a template on Aqua

setFeeManager(address).details: governance function to change the feeManager

params._feeManager: new address allowed to change fees

setFeeNumerator(uint256).details: governance function to change the fee

setFeeTo(address).details: governance function to change the fee recipient

setSaleFee(uint256).details: governance function to change the sale fee

setTemplateFee(uint256).details: governance function to change the template fee

setTemplateLauncher(address).details: governance function to replace the templateLauncher

setTemplateManager(address).details: governance function to change the templateManager

params._templateManager: new address allowed to change templates
